hero.subtitle: Over {count} vintage vehicles for your film

about.title: About Us
about.description1: Since 1980, Il Sorpasso has been the reference point for vintage car rental in the Italian and international film industry.
about.description2: Our passion for historic cars and deep knowledge of the film industry have allowed us to build one of the largest collections of vintage vehicles in Europe.
about.description3: We collaborate with the most important production houses, guaranteeing not only the means but also historical consulting and technical support for any type of project.

vintage.title: VINTAGE CARS
vintage.subtitle: From 1900 to today
vintage.longDescription: Our collection of vintage cars spans from 1900 to today, offering a wide range of vehicles for every cinematic need.

alfa.title: Vintage Alfa Romeo
alfa.description: Italian elegance and sportiness from the 60s

porsche.title: Classic Porsche 911
porsche.description: The icon of German sports cars in classic version

ferrari.title: Ferrari Testarossa
ferrari.description: The 80s legend in all its glory

special.title: SPECIAL VEHICLES
special.subtitle: Guaranteed versatility
special.description: Trucks, vans and military vehicles for every need
special.longDescription: From our fleet of special vehicles, we offer a wide selection of military vehicles, vintage trucks and historic vans.

military.title: Military Vehicles
military.description: Authentic military vehicles for war scenes and historical documentaries

trucks.title: Vintage Trucks
trucks.description: Period trucks perfect for historical scenes and retro settings

vans.title: Classic Vans
vans.description: Vintage vans to give a nostalgic touch to your shots

sea.title: SEA & AIR
sea.subtitle: No limits
sea.longDescription: From vintage boats to historic aircraft, we offer a unique selection of vehicles for your sea and air shots.

yacht.title: Vintage Yachts
yacht.description: Elegant historic vessels for period maritime scenes

planes.title: Classic Aircraft
planes.description: Historic aircraft for aerial scenes and period settings

boats.title: Vintage Speedboats

custom.title: CUSTOMIZATION
custom.subtitle: Made to measure
custom.description: Modifications and transformations for your scenes
custom.longDescription: Our team of experts can modify and customize vehicles according to your specific needs.

paint.title: Custom Paint
paint.description: Complete livery customization for every scenic need

interior.title: Interior Modification
interior.description: Interior reconstruction and customization according to historical period

effects.title: Special Effects
effects.description: Structural modifications for action scenes and special effects

wedding.subtitle: The most beautiful day
wedding.description: Search and sale of vintage cars for weddings
wedding.longDescription: We make every couple's dream come true by finding the perfect car for their special day. Personalized search service and purchase consulting.

rolls.title: Rolls Royce Silver Cloud
rolls.description: The timeless elegance of Rolls Royce, perfect for an unforgettable wedding
